title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 194: Featuring Tyson Nash
description:
On this week's episode, Biz sits down with former NHL player and current member of the Arizona Coyotes Broadcast Team Tyson Nash. The guys talk about transitioning to the media, Tyson's career, Las Vegas stories and more. Whit, RA, and Biz also talk NHL news, Biz walking in on his sister, Kangaroo Court and a ton more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
